name: Slushy Maker: Create Your Own with Photo Editor
name_original: Slushy Maker: Create Your Own with Photo Editor
description:
It's cool, it's refreshing, it's the best slushy maker app in the AppStore!

Create your own slushy, with crazy straw! Add it to your own photos to get the slushy you always wanted, when you want it! Share with your friends, make them a slushy, all without the mess. Get it now!
